title: Rise at Twilight
description: Luna Ketz never thought about life after death. That is until she woke up after being murdered.Caught in limbo between the waking world and the land of the dead, Luna has no choice but to face her demons. Literally. In order to find her son, Asher, she submits herself to the mercy of her long time enemy, Chance Welfrey, but his knowledge may not be enough to save them from their twisted past.Tensions are rising between the God of Dreams and the God of Nightmares, and Keepers are growing desperate to put a lid on the coming war. So desperate that theyâ€™ve abandoned the traditional means of keeping DreamWorld safe, and instead, have put their faith into Asher who may be the key to saving them all.
author: Kayla Krantz
